casebody.data:
IN RE: E.M. 46P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 31, 2019 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, for E.M.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Marie Hartwell Evitt, Attorney at Law, Tammera S. Hill, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st of January 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st of January 2019."
